definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
one's own flesh and blood (idiom); closely related

sentences.english: Education and knowledge has close inner relationship.
sentences.chinese: 教育与知识有着血肉相连的内在关系。

sentences.english: In the plateau region associated with natural flesh deep feelings, is a root.
sentences.chinese: 在高原地区与自然血肉相联的深刻感受，是一种植根。

sentences.english: They concluded that the flesh and blood are human flesh and blood.
sentences.chinese: 他们得出结论，血肉是人类的血肉。

sentences.english: They concluded that the flesh and blood are human flesh and blood.
sentences.chinese: 他们得出结论，血肉是人类的血肉。

sentences.english: Father and son of love in heart, not the flesh and blood relationship.
sentences.chinese: 父子之情在心，而不在于血肉关系。

sentences.english: He was taken to hospital with his legs a mass of bleeding flesh .
sentences.chinese: 他被抬到医院，他的腿血肉模糊。

sentences.english: The thought suffices them, without investing itself in the flesh and blood of action.
sentences.chinese: 他们满足于思想观点，并不想赋予其行动的血肉。

sentences.english: By the time your father got down the hill, his brother was nothing but blood and pulp .
sentences.chinese: 等你爸爸来到山下，他叔叔已经是血肉模糊的一堆了。

sentences.english: We must maintain our flesh-blood relationship with the people.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须要始终保持与人民群众的血肉联系。

sentences.english: Golems of stone, metal, straw, and even flesh exist.
sentences.chinese: 石头，金属，稻草，甚至是血肉构成的傀儡存在着。

sentences.english: Of my final re-transformation from India-rubber back to flesh?
sentences.chinese: 希望我最终从印度皮球再次转变为血肉之躯吗？

sentences.english: N'aix restores some of his life force by eating flesh.
sentences.chinese: 食尸鬼通过吞食目标的血肉来回复自己的生命。

sentences.english: We are always as close as flesh and Blood.
sentences.chinese: 该工会与工人是血肉相连的。

sentences.english: Inside the flesh and blood is the dirtiness more than that inside the hell's sewage.
sentences.chinese: 血肉包裹的躯体里有比地狱的污水更肮脏的东西。

sentences.english: Making sure that your lump of flesh doesn't have its neurons hurt?
sentences.chinese: 确保你血肉之躯的神经细胞不受伤害？

sentences.english: He didn't have any weight about him; he was not even fully flesh.
sentences.chinese: 他没有体重，甚至不完全是血肉之躯。

definition: to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
to be drenched with blood/dripping blood
rain of blood/heavy rain colored by loess sandstorm
